sentence.text: Um , but I think if we quit , uh , building these Taj Mahals with the color TVs and sixty dollars sixty thousand a year to keep an inmate in there - on a - on a - on a life sentence , we should start hanging them and get it over with and let 's just screwing up the system uh .
So what , you know , let 's quit BSing with the system .
People who are under medical direction to lose weight or quit smoking may likewise be quite rightly unwilling to give in to their impulses .
There had to be some around somewhere , from before he 'd quit smoking when he 'd first started to worry about his health .
BRONZE medallist Steve Backley has quit athletics until next year .
LINFORD Christie will quit athletics in two years ' time -- aiming to bow out as the undisputed No 1 sprinter in the world , writes David Harrison .
Michael , 45 , who quit boozing because it threatened to wreck his life , has given up another ` vice '' -- being too generous .
No such complexities for the Stereo MC 's ( can we officially quit calling them ` the underrated Stereo MC 's now then ? ) .
WILD rocker Nicky Wire has quit boozing … after too many hangovers .
` Quit trying to protect me , Harriet . ''
Jill quit the habit shortly before Christmas .
